name: Goodness Of Dice
description:
Click to start the game.

*If you have board game or COC experience it will be easier to get through! 

You will play as the goodness of luck, controlling a player character's board game experience by changing their dice numbers(select the dice number you want to assign down below in the box). Your dice decides the steps they move, the amount of resources they get, and the result of actions they try.

Your dice numbers are limited so you will have to collect new dices on the board, while helping your player complete missions. The game ends where the steps are used up or you don't have any dices.

(The board game is basically a combination of Monopoly + Catan + COC)
